GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles:article_id.description: serves a specifiy article by article_id

exampleResponse.title: The Joy of Programming
exampleResponse.author: Jane Doe
exampleResponse.body: Programming is a craft that blends logic and creativity.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments for a specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a comment to a specific article and returns the posted comment
